variable.name: Output Target
variable.description: This specifies the name of the target file.

variable.name: Output Template
variable.description: This variable contains the name of the template to use when generating the project.

variable.name: Header Files
variable.description: Defines the header files for the project

variable.name: Source Files
variable.description: Defines the source files for the project

variable.name: Include Path
variable.description: Defines the include path for the project

variable.name: Form Files
variable.description: Defines the form files for the project

variable.name: Resource Files
variable.description: Defines the resource files for the project

variable.name: Qt Modules
variable.description: The values stored in the QT variable control which of the Qt modules are used by your project.
